name: MEKAWAR - The last battle of Choik
name_original: MEKAWAR - The last battle of Choik
description:
Solo/Coop, 1-4 Players, MEKAVERSE JAM. 

The city of Choik lives its last battle, the apocalypse is here and its enemies too, help the mekas of Choik to defend the city and kill the mekas invaders ! Take a Meka and Weapon and destroy all enemy waves to make the best score !

Free play on :

https://www.coregames.com/games/d9f72e/mekawar-the-battle-of-choik
